name: ANIREAL_STILLS
prompt_base: Clean editorial look. A glossy children’s fashion magazine cover is split at the center — and the model literally steps out from it. Fragments of paper curl back from the tear, with headlines still visible. Backdrop is a large vertical magazine cover print with full layout: masthead, date, feature lines, barcode. Child steps out through a vertical tear in the center. Studio floor outside is clean and reflective. Front-facing. Walking directly toward camera. One hand brushing back hair. Confident, fashion-week mini look. Hero: Asymmetric pleated dress Supporting: Mid-calf socks, glossy derby shoes Accessory: Mini handbag with metal logo – Tear curls show text layers beneath – Headlines: “Future Icons”, “Mini Vogue Moment” – Barcode warped at corner – Masthead (“K!D MODE”) broken across child’s chest – Dress: Soft twill with asymmetric hem, high waist, contrast belt – Socks: Ribbed knit with logo stripe – Shoes: Polished leather, buckle strap – Bag: Metal logo charm, structured body
